text: Everyone in the company is very professional and eager to please.  They take the time to explain every step of the way.  I was able to watch much of the construction and was pleased with the professionalism and craftsmanship of Justin and Robert, who built the deck.  They, along with Matthew and Jordan were a pleasure with whom to work.  The deck is well built and a great looking addition to our home.
author: John Stalvey
